document.full_text: ban ki-moon formally asked the u.n. security council to support his candidacy for a second five-year term as u.n. secretary-general, according to a letter obtained by reuters on monday.
document.title: ban ki-moon asks u.n. council to remain as chief
lines_and_colors: ban ki-moon formally asked the u.n. security council to support his candidacy for a second five-year term as u.n. secretary-general, according to a letter obtained by reuters on monday.
